native_settings_general_ride_npc_num_des: Set the number of NPCs riding the bus. -1 is random.
native_settings_general_activation_descr: Add an item to enable and disable the bus without a virtual car dealer.
native_settings_activation_bus_descripti: Unlock Mahir MT28 COACH in the vehicle list.
native_settings_keybinds_auto_drive_desc: Start automatic driving. Press again to stop. You cannot set a destination. It will wander around the city.
